```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(wesanderson)
library(readr)
library(pander)
```

```{r}
files <- paste0("parsed/", dir('parsed'))
# Three files so far
files
```

# Repeatibility

```{r, results='asis'}
r1 <- read_csv(file = files[1])
r2 <- r1 %>% select(-AB)
pandoc.table(head(r2))
```

```{r, results = 'asis'}
counts <- r1 %>% group_by(SO) %>% 
            summarise(n = n()) %>% 
            arrange(desc(n)) %>% 
            head

pandoc.table(counts)
```

---
